title: Advanced Gravity Forms Features
description: Master advanced features like conditional logic, file uploads, and multi-page forms.

blocks.content: Take your forms to the next level with advanced Gravity Forms features. Learn how to create sophisticated forms that adapt to user input and handle complex data collection scenarios.

Conditional logic allows you to show or hide fields based on user selections. Here's how to use it effectively:

  • Setting up field conditions
  • Creating dependent field relationships
  • Using multiple conditions
  • Testing conditional logic

Configure secure file uploads:

  • Setting allowed file types
  • Managing file size limits
  • Handling multiple file uploads
  • Securing uploaded files
